select MSG_ID, SENDER, RECEIVER, CREATETIME, LEVELS, CONTENT, TYPE, IP, senderSN from WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO limit #{offset}, #{limit}

update WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO
SENDER = #{sender},
RECEIVER = #{receiver},
CREATETIME = #{createtime},
LEVELS = #{levels},
CONTENT = #{content},
TYPE = #{type},
where MSG_ID = #{msgId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY contactsId ORDER BY createtime DESC) RN ,t.* FROM ( select T.TYPE,t.content,t.createtime, (case when t.sender =#{userId} then t.receiver else t.sender end) as contactsId --最近联系人 from zz_message_info t where (t.sender = #{userId} or t.receiver = #{userId}) and t.type = 'USER' UNION ALL
select T.TYPE,t.content,t.createtime,t.receiver as contactsId from ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO t LEFT JOIN ZZ_USER_GROUP UG ON UG.GROUP_ID=T.RECEIVER where t.type = 'GROUP' and nvl(t.createtime,to_date('1900-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd')) >= nvl(ug.createtime,to_date('2099-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND UG.USER_ID =#{userId} ) t ) ) VO where rn < =100 ORDER BY VO.createtime ASC

select t.type,t.content,t.createtime, t.receiver as contactsId from ZZ_MESSAGE_INFO t
,ZZ_GROUP g
,ZZ_MEETING g
where t.type = #{type}
and ((t.receiver = #{receiver} and t.sender = #{userId}) or (t.sender = #{receiver} and t.receiver = #{userId}) )
and t.receiver = g.group_id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_USER_GROUP u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.group_id = #{receiver} and u.createtime <= t.createtime)
and t.receiver = g.id and t.receiver = #{receiver} and exists ( select 1 from ZZ_MEETING_USER u where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.meeting_id = #{receiver} and u.crt_time <= t.createtime)
ORDER BY t.createtime ASC
